1359380.name: RINGFALL
1359380.description:
The nations are cut into pieces by the meddling of the all-powerful tech syndicate known as The Ring. To survive in a world plagued by proxy wars and corporate espionage is to play along, and PLAY you will! RINGFALL is an upcoming PVP FPS focused on accessibility, fun, and classic FPS fundamentals. Become a recruit for the Argonauts, a solo PMC leading the charge against technological autocracy.

RINGFALL is a first person shooter that is inspired by classic multiplayer shooters of the late 2000's, and looks to pay homage to those games and provide players with a new home. The game will feature Free-For-All modes, Team-Based modes, and Party modes. From slaying your enemies in Team Deathmatch to controlling zones in King Of The Hill to score points, players of all kinds will find something to love.

  • Customize your weapons and equipment to craft loadouts that suit your playstyle.

  • Utilize intuitive movement mechanics to navigate through maps and out-maneuver opponents.

  • Battle in hectic matches of up to 16 players.

  • Complete challenges for different factions, and be rewarded for your allegiance with gear to customize your soldier.

Designed lovingly with accessibility in mind, RINGFALL is built for seasoned shooter veterans, people brand new to the first person shooter genre, and everyone in between! What are you waiting for? Enlist with the Argonauts now!
1359380.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
